name: Restless Roomba
description:
RESTLESS ROOMBA

Restless Roomba is a 3rd person simulator where you play as a little Roomba Vacuum in a giant mansion. Maneuver around objects, furniture, and pets as you suck up crumbs in each room of the mansion all while managing intake capacity.

Credits

Music & SFX by Wenyi Tang:  https://twitter.com/Wen11OxO

Controls

WASD- Movement

Mouse- Camera
